Attributes.description: An examination of the arts as social practices from the standpoint of the relationships among artists, critics, patrons, and public; and the social institutions through which these relationships are structured.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of SOCI 100, SOCI 101, SOCI 102.
